channel.title: How to add server to moparscape
channel.description:
Okay, I have my port forwarded, a host, and no-ip download. I also have a website.
I try to put my server on mopar by filling this in Name : Pkerscape Port 43954 I.P.: "My host name"
Is this correct?
My server is running...
It keeps on saying my server is offline and I need it to be online for it to be register please help Please and thank you!
See ya, Ipwnzyou

Okay, I have my port forwarded, a host, and no-ip download. I also have a website.

Name : Pkerscape
Port 43954

Please and thank you!

See ya,
Ipwnzyou
